function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of thermal imaging for temperature screening","Impact":"Inaccuracy in temperature readings leading to potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Calibration and regular maintenance of thermal imaging devices","Technologies":"Calibrated thermal imaging devices","People":"General public, workers, travelers","Owner":"Health and safety regulators, facility management"},{"Description":"Lack of social distancing in affected areas","Impact":"Increased transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Use of loudspeaker-equipped drone system to enforce social distancing","Technologies":"Loudspeaker-equipped drone system","People":"General public, workers, travelers","Owner":"Health and safety regulators, facility management"},{"Description":"Use of robots and drones for quarantine assistance and containment of COVID-19","Impact":"Reliance on technology without proper implementation or maintenance may lead to ineffective containment of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance, testing, and monitoring of robots and drones","Technologies":"Robots, drones, mobile apps","People":"Healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology companies"}]}
